intro.text: Courier, BoB sealed this block. Hijack the relay and spark the first laugh. #intro_01

firstWave.text: BoB scouts inbound. Tag them and keep the hype climbing. #firstWave_01

bossIncoming.text: BoB signature spike—boss inbound. Save some punchlines for the crowd. #bossIncoming_01

midRun.text: Memes are flowing. BoB is adapting; stay unpredictable. #midRun_01

lateRun.text: Deep in BoB turf. Elites deploying—keep the feed loud. #lateRun_01

lowHp.text: Signal fading! Break line of sight and grab a medkit. #lowHp_01

firstMed.text: Medkit secured. Echo City’s watching—keep moving. #firstMed_01

ticker_gossip1.text: Newsflash: lab coffee machine may be sentient. #ticker_gossip1_01

ticker_gossip2.text: Rumor: maintenance drones plan a union vote. #ticker_gossip2_01

ticker_gossip3.text: Fun fact: drones still can't appreciate jazz. #ticker_gossip3_01

ticker_gossip4.text: Alert: vending machines now accept emotional support coins. @nt #ticker_gossip4_01

ticker_gossip5.text: Insider: test drones spotted debating optimal pathfinding routes. #ticker_gossip5_01

ticker_gossip6.text: Reminder: update reflex implants before prime-time waves. #ticker_gossip6_01

ticker_gossip7.text: Breaking: scientists teach drones to high-five — results mixed. #ticker_gossip7_01

ticker_gossip8.text: Bulletin: cafeteria introduces mystery-flavor nutrient bars. #ticker_gossip8_01

ticker_gossip9.text: Whisper: someone replaced ammo crates with party poppers. Investigating... #ticker_gossip9_01

ticker_gossip10.text: Report: arena floor requests a day off to recharge its tiles. @nt #ticker_gossip10_01

ticker_gossip11.text: Leak: AI curator secretly writes poetry during off cycles. #ticker_gossip11_01

ticker_gossip12.text: FYI: vents rumored to host micro-society of dust bunnies. #ticker_gossip12_01

ticker_gossip13.text: Memo: please stop naming your turrets; recycling gets awkward. #ticker_gossip13_01

ticker_gossip14.text: Rumor: hidden achievement for complimenting a drone before disabling it. #ticker_gossip14_01

ticker_gossip15.text: Alert: rogue trainee spotted speed-running safety briefings. #ticker_gossip15_01

ticker_gossip16.text: Fun fact: reloading to the beat increases accuracy by 0%. Still fun. #ticker_gossip16_01

boss_5_start.text: Broodmaker spawns incoming. Eliminate pods to thin the swarm. #boss_5_start_01

boss_5_down.text: MOD: Broodmaker down. Swarm quieting. Scoop supplies and reset your lane. #boss_5_down_01

boss_5_report.text: MOD: Uplink clean. The block’s laughing again. BoB will counter—eyes up. #boss_5_report_01

boss_10_start.text: MOD: Commissioner Sanitizer’s spire team online. Area denial and beams—strafe clean. #boss_10_start_01

boss_10_down.text: MOD: Sanitizer silenced. Broadcast reached the block. Armory channels are opening. #boss_10_down_01

boss_15_start.text: MOD: Influencer Militia Captain with Ad Zeppelin support. Cancel sponsorship pods to break the shield. #boss_15_start_01

boss_15_down.text: MOD: Captain dropped. Formation broken; sponsors ghosted. #boss_15_down_01

boss_20_start.text: GLITCHCAT: Algorithm Shard Avatar manifesting. Watch emissive tells; play off‑beat. #boss_20_start_01

boss_20_down.text: GLITCHCAT: Shard reconciled. Signal variance restored. #boss_20_down_01

boss_25_start.text: Broodmaker returns, reinforced. Spread the damage, clear eggs fast. #boss_25_start_01

boss_25_down.text: Heavy Broodmaker down. You are becoming the problem. #boss_25_down_01

boss_30_start.text: Hydraclone detected. Eliminate clones quickly to prevent overwhelming numbers. #boss_30_start_01

boss_30_down.text: Hydraclone neutralized. The field quiets—for now. #boss_30_down_01

boss_35_start.text: Strike Adjudicator enters. Expect precision strikes and punish windows—stay moving. #boss_35_start_01

boss_35_down.text: Adjudicator down. You have exceeded projections. #boss_35_down_01
